REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0612 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-GIV 03-12 0104

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET GIVEN FURTHER 442 MLN STG HELP
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it provided the market with a further 442 mln stg assistance during the morning to offset a liquidity shortage it estimated at 1.60 billion stg, revised up from 1.55 billion The bank bought outright eight mln stg of band one treasury bills and five mln stg of band one bank bills at 10-3/8 pct. It bought a further 429 mln stg of bills for resale to the discount houses on April 2 at an interest rate of 10-7/16 pct. So far today, the bank has given the market assistance worth a total of 1.501 billion stg. REUTER
